name: The Labyrinth (itch) (ShadowGod1616)
description:
First Person Shooter where you have to escape the labyrinth. It has a very ambiguous ending.

Controller support added.

Mouse & Keyboard Controls:
WSAD for movement &Mouse for turning
Shift for sprint
Ctrl for crouch
V for shield
LMB for shoot & RMB for aim
E for picking up items
Scroll for changing weapon

Controller Controls:
Left Stick for movement & Right Stick for turning
Left Stick pressed for sprint
Right Stick pressed for crouch
B/Circle for shield
RT/R2 for shoot & LT/L2 for aim
 X/Square for picking up items

PS: I have not added finite Ammo as that would make the experience more annoying IMO.
